text: William Frazier Thomas (June 13, 1918 â€“ April 3, 1985) was an American television personality and writer. Thomas wrote nine children's books, he was best known for creating, hosting, writing and producing the long-running children's television program Garfield Goose and Friends on WGN-TV. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Frazier Thomas: Friend and More Bill Granger, 15 April 1985, Chicago Tribune *Tribute to Thomas Thomas K. title: Frazier Thomas
